creator: uLektz Learning Solutions Pvt. Ltd
descriptionHtml:
BSP Books Pvt. Ltd. promotes and market books of BS Publications and PharmaMed Press and also exclusives taken from foreign publishers. BSP Books Pvt. Ltd. Have dedicated team of field executives under a Marketing Head with a clear mandate to make our books reach wider audiences within India and abroad.BS Publications was started in 1989, with the aim of creating useful student, friendly and quality textbooks to satisfy the needs of B.Tech. Students, who were joining the numerous professional engineering colleges established across in India by various Technical Universities. Our publishing program is focused in 5 key areas. Such as Textbooks, Reference Books,Classics Reprints, Low Priced Editions of Foreign Books, Conference Proceedings
PharmaMed Press: This new imprint under Pharma Book Syndicate publishes books Textbooks, Reference books, Classic Reprints, International Journal in the interdisciplinary areas of Pharmacy, Medical & Life Sciences, Chemistry, Biotechnology for the students and reference books for the Pharmaceutical and Biotechnological Industry.BSP Books Pvt Ltd in collaboration with uLektz Learning Solutions Private Limited introduces eBookstore and eReader app exclusively for BSP customers. This app provides all kinds educational books in digital format (pdf and/or ePub), which can be purchased and accessed both online and offline (i.e., without Internet Connectivity). While providing the ebooks, this app will also help students create their own profile, practice and improve their aptitude and English verbal ability, take up skill courses on MOOCs model, and connect with industry for professional development and better job opportunities.
Important features of this app are:
* Purchase ebooks or redeem them using appropriate coupons
* Access and read both online or offline
* Bookmark the pages
* Increase or decrease font size for better reading experience
descriptionShort: BSP Official app - Provides all kinds of educational ebooks, journals,etc.

descriptionHtml:
BSP Books Pvt. Ltd. promotes and market books of BS Publications and PharmaMed Press and also exclusives taken from foreign publishers. BSP Books Pvt. Ltd. Have dedicated team of field executives under a Marketing Head with a clear mandate to make our books reach wider audiences within India and abroad.BS Publications was started in 1989, with the aim of creating useful student, friendly and quality textbooks to satisfy the needs of B.Tech. Students, who were joining the numerous professional engineering colleges established across in India by various Technical Universities. Our publishing program is focused in 5 key areas. Such as Textbooks, Reference Books,Classics Reprints, Low Priced Editions of Foreign Books, Conference Proceedings
PharmaMed Press: This new imprint under Pharma Book Syndicate publishes books Textbooks, Reference books, Classic Reprints, International Journal in the interdisciplinary areas of Pharmacy, Medical & Life Sciences, Chemistry, Biotechnology for the students and reference books for the Pharmaceutical and Biotechnological Industry.BSP Books Pvt Ltd in collaboration with uLektz Learning Solutions Private Limited introduces eBookstore and eReader app exclusively for BSP customers. This app provides all kinds educational books in digital format (pdf and/or ePub), which can be purchased and accessed both online and offline (i.e., without Internet Connectivity). While providing the ebooks, this app will also help students create their own profile, practice and improve their aptitude and English verbal ability, take up skill courses on MOOCs model, and connect with industry for professional development and better job opportunities.
Important features of this app are:
* Purchase ebooks or redeem them using appropriate coupons
* Access and read both online or offline
* Bookmark the pages
* Increase or decrease font size for better reading experience
descriptionShort: BSP Official app - Provides all kinds of educational ebooks, journals,etc.
